enchantment.infinity_cave.anti_gravity.d: Reduces gravity attribute increasing for each level.
Ignores 5% of opponents armor for each level.
enchantment.infinity_cave.battleheart.de: Increases attack damage by 0.5 for each level.
enchantment.infinity_cave.defiance.desc: The more Infinity Cave mobs there are around player, the more damage. Caps at 10 mobs.
enchantment.infinity_cave.durable.desc: Like the Unbreaking enchantment, but it is significantly stronger.
enchantment.infinity_cave.entity_touch.d: Increases entity reach by 0.5 for each level.
enchantment.infinity_cave.exoshot.desc: Arrows deal extra damage to arthropods.
enchantment.infinity_cave.experience.des: Increases the amount of XP mobs drop on kill.
enchantment.infinity_cave.explosion_resi: Increases explosion knockback resistance for each level.
enchantment.infinity_cave.farhold.desc: Increases block reach by 0.5 for each level.
Increasese attack speed for each level.
enchantment.infinity_cave.firework_arrow: Arrows have an powerful firework explosion attacked to them.
enchantment.infinity_cave.fleet.desc: Shooting an enemy has a chance to give the user speed.
enchantment.infinity_cave.goat_legs.desc: Increases step height by 0.5 for each level.
Falling increases grabity and pounds the ground dealing AoE damage.
enchantment.infinity_cave.lifesteal.desc: Has a chance to regain health on hit.
enchantment.infinity_cave.outlaw_shot.de: Arrows deal extra damage to raid mobs.
enchantment.infinity_cave.plunder.desc: Raid mobs take extra damage, may drop an emerald on hit.
enchantment.infinity_cave.pushback.desc: Has a chance to push close targets away from the user on being hit.
enchantment.infinity_cave.replenish.desc: Has a chance to recover health on being hit.
enchantment.infinity_cave.scatter.desc: Increases arrow count by 1 for each level, spreading a tiny bit.
enchantment.infinity_cave.smite_shot.des: Arrows deal extra damage to undead mobs.
enchantment.infinity_cave.spiderweb.desc: Has a small chance to spawn a web on the target hit.
enchantment.infinity_cave.sprinter.desc: Increases speed by 7.5% for each level.
enchantment.infinity_cave.tipped.desc: Has a chance to poison the target on hit.
enchantment.infinity_cave.vitality.desc: Grants more health for each level.
enchantment.infinity_cave.yield.desc: Mining ores yields more exp for each level.
